page.title: 03Steyning Events
page.content: The Easter Monday walking race has been going on for 61 years.It is held around Steyning.The men start outside the clock tower and they walk 15 miles. The girls and the boys do 3km so do the women. In 1912 Mr Ernie Adcock finished outside the clock tower and made the fastest time ever in the walking race. In the past the crowd had to have a rope tied in front of them because they went mad with excitement! Steyning is a sporting town and many great walkers live here like Dennis Read and Norman Read.
